results.title: Report a missed bin
results.snippet: Use this service to tell us if we have missed a bin collection. You can report a missed bin up to 2 days after the collection date.

strengths: Direct link for reporting a missed bin
Allows users to report a missed bin up to 2 days after the collection date
selected_links.reasoning: This option provides a straightforward method for users to notify the council of missed bin collections. It is specifically optimized for reporting missed bin collections and allows the user to report up to 2 days after the scheduled pickup.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content clearly states the purpose of using the service ('Tell us if we have missed a bin collection') and provides specific instructions for reporting a missed bin collection ('You can report a missed bin up to 2 days after the collection date').
Reason.next_actions: Follow the link provided ('Start now') to report the missed collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: The content effectively answers the council resident's need for reporting a missed bin collection, providing clear instructions and a time frame. However, it could improve by specifying who to contact if they encounter issues or have additional questions regarding the process.
